column5: just curious where everyone is fishing this sunday. i havent been out once this year,was supposed to last weekend but all the thunderstorms we were supposed to have cancelled it,and as most of us know it was all sunny and warm,to my dismay. its hard to get out at all,life keeps getting in the way,sunday is supposed to rain and im concerned about the wind and cold front,mostly the wind. im gonna do my best to avoid it. original plan was to go to the parry sound area,but if weather is gonna be better elsewhere ill go there lol
The word is the further north, the better.  Sometimes the weather report is right, sometimes it,s way wrong. Just go and find something.
I will have the recliner at nap level and be out fishing Monday.
Not out till Wednesday .  This weekends a write off on the big pond.
ya its not looking good. guess it will be a game time decision. i wish i could get out on week days.
Gonna try for eyes on Pigeon Monday. Folks will have left them alone on the weekend. Been a disappointing spring for me so far. Tired of blaming mayflies. ?
trying to decide between 'up North' and 'way up North' ---my 2 favorite places!!!
Ditto! Got my fix this morning. Muskies monday!
Sunday nada... Monday Long Point... YEA!  :D
Life is really getting in the way this year.. there's a good chance I won't get out anymore this year...

we'll be fishing for fly balls down at the Skydome - er Rogers Center - got some sweet seats from a local season ticket holder. Usually when I book something like this - its a perfect fishing weekend -
